The band has received 32 awards from a total of 103 nominations. ==Alternative Press Music Awards== |- | rowspan="4" | 2014 | Vessel | Album of the Year | |- | rowspan="2" | Twenty One Pilots | |rowspan="2" | Twenty One Pilots |rowspan="2" | Best Rock Band | |- |2017 | |} == ZD Awards == Zvukovaya Dorozhka (, "soundtrack") is Russia's oldest hit parade in the field of popular music. Since 2003 it is presented in a ceremony in concert halls. It's considered one of the major Russian music awards. ! |- | 2018 | Twenty One Pilots | Best Foreign Act | | style="text-align:center;" | |- |} ==References== Twenty One Pilots Awards
title: List of awards and nominations received by Twenty One Pilots
